title: ISic000433. Funerary stone of Gn. Julius Felix
body:
Facsimile Images

((corona))
D(is) M(anibus)
Cn(aeus) ((·)) Iulius Fe-
lix ((·)) Cn(aeo) ((·)) Iulio
5Felici filio
qui vix(it) ((·)) ann(os)
II ((·)) men(sis) ((·)) VIIII
die(s) ((·)) uno
------

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the shades of the underworld. Gnaeus Julius Felix (made this) for his son Gnaeus Julius Felix who lived two years, nine months and one day

commentary
